messages.message:
@junaid raised an interesting question/request during today's Instabasics session around AI Hub fundamentals that I thought I'd share here:
â€¢ Being able to generate plots in Converse is really cool; are there plans to build out this feature in Build s.t. we can generate plots for documents as part of a more IDP workflow?
what would be the use-cases for this? :slightly_smiling_face:

The question was more out of curiosity, but I suppose it could be helpful if someone needed to process a ton of financial documents (10ks), or maybe even turning medical results into a bunch of charts?
I see a massive benefit with Cross documents ( next ish release ) to compare results between documents or different trends. ( that s how I use it in Converse )
@cyrille are you looking to compare the graphs or the underlying data?
The underlying data. Such as trend in salaries from payslips, or indicators on financial statements
For that presumably we wouldn't need generated plots in build right - just cross-doc reasoning?
